message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product for $1400000. I believe it's a fair price given its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1250000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1250000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1350000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product to you. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1350000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but unfortunately, $1200000 is still not a viable price for me.  I'm willing to be flexible and offer a final price of $1300000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value you place on the product.  If this doesn't work, I'll have to explore other options.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with $1300000. I'm willing to go up to $1280000, which is the absolute maximum I'm willing to pay. I hope you can meet me at this price.
